files.description: This file contains the setup configuration for packaging the application using setuptools. It specifies package metadata including name, version, packages, install requirements, and console script entry points.
This file lists the dependencies required for the application, such as pytest.
Initializer file for the src package. Ensures the directory is treated as a Python package.
Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Parses each line into a dictionary containing surah number, ayah number, and verse text, and handles file not found errors gracefully.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file line by line, parses lines formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text' into dictionaries, and returns a list of these dictionaries. Handles FileNotFoundError by printing an error message.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. Implements two functions: search_word_in_quran for searching for a word in the Quran data, and search_word_group for searching for a word group phrase with support for case sensitivity options. The module provides clear documentation for parameters and return types.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses. Iterates over the provided list of Quran data dictionaries to check for the presence of the search word in the verse text. Supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data containing verses.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search within the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Optional flag to perform a case-sensitive search, defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (exact phrase) in the Quran verses. Iterates over the provided Quran data to check if the exact phrase is present in the verse text, supporting both case-sensitive and case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data containing verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (exact phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Optional flag to perform a case-sensitive search, defaults to False.

files.description: Main entry point for the Quran search application. Loads Quran text from a file, performs a search for the word 'اللَّهِ', and prints the search results to the console.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function that orchestrates loading Quran data, searching for the word 'اللَّهِ', and printing the search results. Acts as the primary entry point for the application.

files.description: Initializer file for the tests package. Marks the directory as a Python package for unit tests.

Test suite for the Quran search functionality. Uses Python's unittest framework to validate the behavior of the search_word_in_quran and search_word_group functions from the quran_search module using both real and dummy data. It covers various scenarios including case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches.

classes.name: TestQuranSearch
classes.description: Unit test suite for validating the Quran search functions including case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches as well as various scenarios with both real and dummy data.

methods.name: test_search_allah_word
methods.description: Test that searching for the word 'اللَّهِ' returns at least one verse using case-insensitive search. Loads Quran data from file and verifies that the result list is non-empty.

methods.name: test_search_word_group
methods.description: Test that search_word_group returns expected results for an existing word group and returns an empty list for a non-existing group. Also checks surah and ayah numbers for the matched verse.

methods.name: test_case_insensitive_search_word
methods.description: Test search_word_in_quran function in case-insensitive mode using a dummy dataset, ensuring both matching verses are returned regardless of case.

methods.name: test_case_sensitive_search_word
methods.description: Test search_word_in_quran function in case-sensitive mode using a dummy dataset, ensuring that only verses matching the exact case are returned.

methods.name: test_case_insensitive_search_word_group
methods.description: Test search_word_group function in case-insensitive mode with a dummy dataset, verifying that both verses with different cases are matched.

methods.name: test_case_sensitive_search_word_group
methods.description: Test search_word_group function in case-sensitive mode with a dummy dataset, ensuring that only exact case matches are returned.

files.description: Data file containing Quran text in Uthmani script. Each line is formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text'.
